ygData.subject: Don't laugh at this question
ygData.msgSnippet: Was wondering if there is a good place for me to solo at 35th level?  Spent four hours in Sol A last night in a party and killed a ton of blue goblins. I got
ygData.messageBody:
Was wondering if there is a good place for me to solo at 35th level? Spent
four hours in Sol A last night in a party and killed a ton of blue goblins.
I got maybe 3/4 bar of EXP. The camp was safe but actually pretty boring.
I'm willing to take a risk soloing if it will help me get out of 35th. I'm
thinking about the only place for me to solo at 35 is Rathe Mtns charming
giants against one another. Anyone got a better suggestion. Would it just
be better to join a group in one of the dungeons or kill ogre bouncers?

Galtin of E'ci
